programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Margherita Taylor and Joe Crowley prove there is more to Sherwood Forest than Robin Hood.

programme.title: Beechgrove Garden
programme.desc: Beechgrove Garden is back and ready to guide you through a season of great growing.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: As farming season gets under way, Dougie Vipond attends a ploughing competition in Fife.

programme.title: Easter from Kings
programme.desc: The traditional celebration of Easter with music and readings recorded in the candlelit Chapel of King's College, Cambridge, with the college's world-renowned choir under director Daniel Hyde. Members of the college will read from the King James Bible, and there is music from Bach, Mozart and Tchaikovsky. The service is led by the Dean, the Revd Dr Stephen Cherry.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: A collection of the greatest moments from the highly entertaining cookery show in which top chefs prepare delicious meals with celebrity guests.

programme.title: Coast to Coast Food Festival
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Edith Bowman and Sean Fletcher explore food festivals and markets.

programme.title: Walking With...
programme.desc: Ainsley Harriott introduces a selection of classic recipes from some of the BBC's best-loved television chefs. Ainsley serves up a family-sized slab of chocolate recipes guaranteed to please the nation's chocoholics. The menu includes the Greedy Italians' classic chocolate pudding, the Hairy Bikers' 'world's best' brownies, a chocolate mousse from Raymond Blanc, James Martin's marshmallows with chocolate dipping sauce and a surprise from Nigella Lawson - chocolate pasta.

programme.title: Parade de printemps
programme.desc: En rendant visite à Nadine, sa partenaire, le danseur Don Hewes apprend qu'elle a rompu le contrat qui les liait. Vexé, mais plein d'entrain, Don décide de monter un numéro avec la première danseuse venue. C'est ainsi qu'il contacte Hannah Brown, qui se produit dans un bar. Sa nouvelle partenaire s'éprend de lui, alors qu'il aime toujours Nadine. Don tente d'abord de façonner Hannah à son goût, mais comprend vite qu'il doit la laisser être elle-même, afin qu'elle exprime son talent. De son côté, son ami Jonathan Harrow, dont Nadine est tombée amoureuse, courtise en vain Hannah. Le nouveau numéro de danse est un véritable succès... Année de réalisation : 1948

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: Talking Pictures tells the story of the Hollywood musical.

programme.title: La magie de l'oeuf
programme.desc: David Attenborough révèle toute la magie des oeufs, de leur création jusqu'à la naissance de l'oisillon, en passant par le développement d'un oeuf d'oiseau.

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: Today, Flog It! comes from Normanby Hall in Lincolnshire, where hundreds of local people are welcomed with their family heirlooms. Our experts find the most interesting items to take off to auction, while Paul Martin learns how the stately home was turned into a hospital for forces during World War I.

programme.title: Mission déco
programme.desc: The five remaining designers redecorate 1930s beachside chalets in Eastbourne.

programme.title: Course sans frontières
programme.desc: Dans cette série, plusieurs duo de voyageurs s'affrontent dans une compétition inédite. Comment relier Londres à Singapour sans prendre l'avion, sans smartphone ni matériel moderne et avec un budget très limité ? C'est le défi que doivent relever ces six équipes.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a Manchester factory that churns out 6 million Jaffa Cakes every single day - 1.4 billion per year. Cherry Healey visits Jaffa, the city responsible for growing the fruit that gives these cakes their name. Ruth Goodman investigates why an urgent legal decision was required as to whether they are cakes or biscuits.

programme.title: The Boleyns: A Scandalous Family
programme.desc: Anne has grown into a real beauty. She is dazzling, and the king is caught in the glare. Her family play the long game to catch a king.

programme.title: Commando: Britain's Ocean Warriors
programme.desc: We go behind the scenes of one of the most elite military organisations in the world, following young recruits Dom and Kane as they attempt to earn the prestigious green beret. They have both completed a gruelling seven months of training, but can they become one of only 1% of the original applicants who go all the way, earning the right to call themselves commandos?

programme.title: Last Woman on Earth with Sara Pascoe
programme.desc: Writer and comedian Sara Pascoe returns with her unique travelogue, learning how to do the world's endangered jobs. In Greece, she meets the last monk in a monastery, a family of church bell makers and some villagers who communicate by whistling to each other.

programme.title: Eternal Beauty
programme.desc: Jane a été abandonnée par son fiancé le jour de leur mariage, alors qu'ils se trouvaient devant l'autel. Cet épisode traumatisant a plongé la jeune femme dans une dépression proche de la schizophrénie, au cours de laquelle elle confond rêve et réalité. La situation semble cependant s'améliorer quand elle fait la connaissance de Mike, un musicien raté et un peu perdu, et qu'ils commencent à sortir ensemble. Année de réalisation : 2019

programme.title: Gods of Snooker
programme.desc: Alex Higgins upsets the snooker establishment but turns the game into box office gold.

programme.title: Programme non communiqué
programme.desc: Malheureusement, aucune information sur les programmes n'était disponible auprès de la chaîne au moment de la mise sous presse. Pour savoir ce qui est diffusé, nous vous recommandons de consulter le site web de la chaîne de télévision.

programme.title: Burt Bacharach at the BBC
programme.desc: When Burt Bacharach passed away in February 2023 at the age of 94, the world said goodbye to one of the all-time songwriting greats. This celebration of the man and his music features a selection of the finest songs from his extraordinary back catalogue and some "magic moments" from the BBC's archives. With performances from artists like Aretha and Adele, Dusty and Dionne, Cilla Black and the White Stripes, this is a collection that highlights exactly why Burt was considered a legend by fans, critics and fellow artists, demonstrating once again the why he and his compositions are universally loved by "anyone who had a heart."

programme.title: My Life at Easter with Sally Phillips
programme.desc: Sally Philips meets writer and broadcaster Gyles Brandreth to discover how Easter has informed a life filled with love, faith, politics and pantomime. Gyles's story takes him from family Easter egg hunts and searching for the secrets of happiness through to the paradox of combining a love of frivolity and light entertainment with a political career. For once, Gyles is lost for words as he discusses his blessings on an emotional spring walk with Sally.

programme.title: Wild Isles
programme.desc: David Attenborough enters the woods, revealing a host of hidden marvels amongst the trees.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
